Tequila 60 ml.
Cointreau 30 ml.
30 ml lime juice.
Ice.
Salt for the rim of the glass.

Take the glass and rub the edge with the 3/4 lime juice, immediately after passing the edges of the salt. Place all ingredients (except salt) in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and serve the drink (which should be salted on its edge) Garnish with a slice of lemon on the rim

1 long glass with salt on the rim.
100ml tequila blanco.
1 teaspoon of lime juice.
Grapefruit Soda.
Ice.
the ice is placed in the cup, add tequila and lime juice and finish filling with grapefruit soda
1/3 de Tequila.\n1/3 lemon or lime juice.\n1/3 coke soda.

Spread salt on a plate. Rub the rim of the glass with lime wedge and wipe the salt so that it is covered. Mix all ingredients in a shaker with crushed ice and shake vigorously. Strain into the cocktail glass salt and garnish with a slice of lime. </ String>
